summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Netflix Dashboard. Backend APIs work perfectly (6/6 tests passed) with 6,234 Netflix titles loaded. Frontend renders all visualizations correctly including metrics, charts, and data table. Critical issue: public backend URL (https://demobackend.emergentagent.com) returns 404 - needs Kubernetes ingress configuration.

critical_bugs.issue: Public backend URL https://demobackend.emergentagent.com returns 404 for all API endpoints
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot access dashboard via public URL - only works on localhost
critical_bugs.details: Backend works perfectly on localhost:8001 but public URL routing not configured

integration_issues.issue: Frontend cannot connect to backend via public URL due to 404 responses

passed_tests: Movies vs Series pie chart and bar chart
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Configure Kubernetes ingress to route https://demobackend.emergentagent.com/api/* requests to backend service on port 8001. Backend works perfectly locally but public URL returns 404. Update REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL to use correct public endpoint once routing is fixed.
